name: The Vintage Face Depot
tagline: Update your look with our vast selection of vintage visages
body:
##Time for a change?

The Vintage Face Depot services all your face replacement needs. Our special bot-powered fitting service automatically matches you with a face drawn from our large stock of vintage visages.

###Before
![Before](https://dl.dropbox.com/s/07cxlk0u7t1zm1m/before.jpg)

###After
![after](https://dl.dropbox.com/s/708mdkjz21rzwgz/after.jpg)

View more of our [successful face replacements](https://www.dropbox.com/sc/jew04kwv5ejwh9o/AADpP2l4tDx6r0BSZYNcoRSba).

##Automated fitting service

Simply tweet a photograph of yourself to [@facedepot](http://twitter.com/facedepot). Within minutes our bot will reply with an image of the new you. Marvel at the transformation!

To assist you in learning more about your new face, our bot includes a link to the newspaper article from which the replacement was obtained. View a [sample tweet](https://twitter.com/facedepot/status/604806259712204800).

For best results your photograph should have an even contrast and your facial features should be visible.

##Our faces

Our vintage visages our extracted with care from the vast collection of digitised newspapers available through [Trove](http://trove.nla.gov.au). At the present moment we have almost 4,000 faces in stock, dating from 1880 to 1910. Many more will be added soon!

##Behind the scenes

The workings of our bot [are available](https://github.com/wragge/face-depot) for public scrutiny and reuse.

The Vintage Face Depot was created by [Tim Sherratt](http://discontents.com.au) ([@wragge](http://twitter.com/wragge)).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
